<h3 id="X39828">X(39828) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: TANGENTIAL TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (S^4+(2*SW*R^2+SA^2-3*SB*SC)*S^2+(2*R^2-SW)*SA*SW^2)*(SB+SC)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39828) = 3*X(3)-2*X(39831) = 3*X(6)-2*X(39819) = 3*X(154)-X(39820) = 3*X(381)-2*X(39818) = X(9861)-3*X(9909) = X(9876)-3*X(10245) = 2*X(13175)+X(39812) = X(13175)+2*X(39825) = 3*X(13175)+2*X(39831) = 3*X(14070)-2*X(39854) = 3*X(39811)-X(39819) = X(39812)-4*X(39825) = 3*X(39812)-4*X(39831) = 3*X(39825)-X(39831)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(39828) lies on the tangential circle and these lines: {2,14656}, {3,115}, {6,39805}, {22,98}, {23,147}, {24,99}, {25,114}, {26,2782}, {30,39841}, {52,39839}, {55,39821}, {56,39815}, {110,39807}, {148,7488}, {154,39820}, {159,39644}, {161,542}, {182,3981}, {184,39810}, {186,13172}, {230,32762}, {378,10723}, {381,39818}, {511,1971}, {543,14070}, {620,6642}, {690,2931}, {1569,9699}, {1593,39809}, {1614,39808}, {2023,9609}, {2070,2936}, {2794,7387}, {2797,14703}, {2799,11616}, {2937,12188}, {2971,14669}, {3029,9570}, {3044,9707}, {3425,36849}, {3515,10992}, {3563,4558}, {5020,6721}, {5899,38744}, {5969,15577}, {5984,37913}, {5989,37123}, {6033,7517}, {6644,33813}, {6676,39120}, {6722,7393}, {6776,39804}, {7395,23514}, {7503,14639}, {7506,15561}, {7509,14061}, {7512,14651}, {7516,34127}, {7526,22515}, {7529,36519}, {7530,22505}, {8185,9864}, {8276,8997}, {8277,13989}, {8591,37940}, {8781,9723}, {8939,39826}, {8943,39827}, {8996,12972}, {9571,34454}, {9590,13174}, {9591,9860}, {9645,39851}, {9658,12184}, {9659,13182}, {9672,13183}, {9673,12185}, {9714,14981}, {9715,39832}, {9862,12088}, {9876,10245}, {10323,34473}, {11365,11724}, {11414,38749}, {12083,38741}, {12085,39860}, {12117,15078}, {12131,15928}, {12178,20872}, {13178,15177}, {14667,16678}, {14790,39845}, {16278,22109}, {17834,39849}, {17928,21166}, {17974,38356}, {18378,38743}, {18534,39838}, {19189,39814}, {31305,39842}, {31953,34131}, {35243,38747}</p>
<p>
X(39828) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 13175}, {17834, 39849}, {31305, 39842}, {39821, 39822}<br>
X(39828) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 39825), (6, 39811), (12085, 39860), (14790, 39845), (39812, 3), (39813, 39816), (39857, 26)<br>
X(39828) = anticomplement of X(39816)<br>
X(39828) = complement of X(39813)<br>
X(39828) = tangential circle-antipode of-X(39857)<br>
X(39828) = circumcircle-inverse of-X(31842)<br>
X(39828) = crosssum of X(512) and X(36472)<br>
X(39828) = X(103)-of-tangential-triangle if ABC is acute<br>
X(39828) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 39813, 39816), (25, 39803, 114), (184, 39817, 39810), (13175, 39825, 39812), (39805, 39806, 6), (39823, 39824, 6), (39829, 39830, 6)<br>
</p>
